list.abs: as laparoscopy via the intraperitoneal route yields a higher morbidity , retroperitoneal route was believed to be more feasible for most patients with urological diseases .考虑腹腔镜经腹入路的合并症及泌尿系统的特点，认为经腹膜外入路对多数泌尿系疾病更适宜。

methods : transvaginal ultrasound were performed on 82 patients who were diagnosed by laparoscopy after the treatment .方法：对82例经腹腔镜病理确诊的子宫腺肌病患者进行治疗前后子宫肌壁变化的超声观察比较。
